mapper.select: SELECT mem_num, LISTAGG(item_num, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_num) AS item_num_list, LISTAGG(item_quantity, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_num) AS item_quantity_list, LISTAGG(cart_price, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_num) AS cart_price_list, SUM(cart_price) AS total_price FROM cart WHERE mem_num = #{mem_num} GROUP BY mem_num
